page.title: 11Lead Lane Tree Planting.
page.content: A scheme to provide seven streets in Ripon's Lead Lane housing estate with trees has been suggested. Maple Walk, Cedar Close, Elm Road, Oak Walk, Lime Walk, Beech Road and Lead Lane will soon live up to their name and be planted with some one hundred and fifty trees between them. It is hoped to plant the trees that are appropriate to name of the street. Harrogate Borough Council and the Ripon Civic Society have agreed to cover the cost of the scheme. A tree planting ceremony will be arranged in cooperation with the Civic Society and the Ripon in Bloom committee. The scheme will cost Â£2,700.
